summary: Investigated routing structure for work and dashboard routes
Analyzed existing route configurations and navigation components

suggestedTasks.title: Complete Migration of /work Route to /dash
suggestedTasks.description:
Finish renaming /work route directory to /dash. This requires:
- Moving all contents of /routes/work/* to /routes/dash/
- Updating all internal links and references from /work to /dash
- Ensuring no broken links or routing issues
- Verifying redirects work correctly
suggestedTasks.reason: Route migration was initiated but not completed

suggestedTasks.title: Audit and Standardize Route Favicon and Metadata
suggestedTasks.description:
Review and standardize favicon and og:image metadata across all routes. Ensure consistent SEO and visual branding by:
- Checking favicon implementations in ide/static/favicons/
- Updating metadata in route components
- Creating a consistent metadata template
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified inconsistent favicon and metadata handling during route investigation

patterns: Route migration requires comprehensive link and reference updates
Always check redirects and internal navigation when changing routes
gotchas: Multiple references to /work route exist across components
Partial migration can lead to broken navigation

documentationNeeds: Update route migration process in project documentation
Document new routing structure and redirect strategy
